name: Chancey
description:
Chancey is a game of total chance. It is a little bit like keno, except you don't bet anything.

How to play: left click to add a chance square. Right click to remove a chance square. You get up to only 5 chance squares per game. Each time a token land on your chance square, you get 3 points.

Press Esc to exit the game at any time.
